body:
Hi!

I finally started a youtube channel.
First Video i created:http://youtu.be/oNXR4qlNLoU
Mining the Monument on Campi Erbosi!
I will post every 2-4 days and I'll be taking any suggestions on what to do!

title: New Channel - First Video

replies.body:
Watched it, great video!
I would recommend putting in some music so that the audience doesn't get too bored, or commentary if you're planning on ever commentating.

Other than that, keep it up!

Edit: I just found out how. 
Have any good music i should add?

replies.body: You should do commentary :D You'll get bigger with commentating and too many avicus people use music .-.

replies.body: Well if you're interested in any music for your videos, I would suggest something like edm, dubstep, or something that gets the audience hyped. However commentary WILL get you a bigger audience, as Pyro / Bader said. Your choice! :)

Ye. I'm going to use Music for now till i can get a better headset.

For Music i decided to just use a radio so i don't need to choose the music all the time
